website_summaries.verdict: The right penlight if you want something small enough to carry in your pocket or purse without adding bulk.
pros: Compact and sturdy for a penlight at this price

customer_reviews.title: very small very bright

customer_reviews.title: Basic, cheap, pocket sized backup flashlight
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty bright and very lightweight, but it does not feel high quality. The little lens that should protect the bulb is missing so it will have zero water resistance. It does tend to heat up fairly quickly. The little clip is reversible so you can use it on a pocket or the brim of a hat, but it’s very easy to dislodge. Also took forever to ship. But it’s cheap as hell.

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable!

customer_reviews.title: Battery consumption

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap, bright.
customer_reviews.text: Bright enough for every day carry. Expect to lose the clip if you don't super glue/epoxy it in place. I would prefer a backwards clip to accommodate fitting it on the bill of a baseball cap. Good, simple switch. I'm not a fan of the levels/strobe I features of other lights so a simple on/off switch is perfect. A great light for the price. I regard all of these <$5 LED lights as semi disposable and this one is no different. Buy a few. Keep 'em around for when you need them.
